## R Markdown

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(rgl)
library(rglwidget)
plot3d(matrix(rnorm(300), ncol=3))
ids <- rgl.ids()$id
planes3d(1,2,3, 4)

playwidget("testID", subsetControl(subsets=as.list(ids)),
           labels=seq_along(ids))
```
